title: PBE account
body: So a while back, around a year or year and a half ago I made a PBE account named LongDongJohnny (I think) or something very similar, and I remember one day (over six months ago to a year I think) I tried logging on and it said "invalid username and password." But I know that I used the actual one and I tried for a long time to get in but it didn't work. I'm wondering is there a way to tell if your account has been through the cycle or can a rioter check my account? Thanks so much if you can help me {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: You can try to recover the password for your PBE account using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#h2q3). If you continue to have issues recovering it, please let me know.
Thank you! I got it working again.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
